casebody.data:
STATE of Missouri, Respondent,
v.
Maurice R. HOGAN, Appellant. WD 80593 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: August 28, 2018 Nancy McKerrow, Columbia, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Nathan Aquino, Jefferson City, MO, Counsel for Respondent. Before Division One: Thomas H. Newton, P.J., Cynthia L. Martin, and Gary D. Witt, JJ.

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Mr. Maurice R. Hogan appeals his convictions by a Cole County jury for first-degree child molestation, § 566.067, and sexual misconduct involving a child by indecent exposure, § 566.083. The trial court sentenced him to concurrent terms of twenty-five years' imprisonment for child molestation and five years for sexual misconduct. We affirm. Rule 30.25(b).
